content.question: If <math alttext="f of x equals, the square root of, x to the fourth power, plus 8, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>8</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>, then <math alttext="f prime of negative 1, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo></mrow></math>
